description: This script automates the build and installation process of the AppGateway plugin for the app-gateway2 project. It sets up environment variables, verifies necessary directories and files, configures build parameters with CMake, runs the build process, and handles installation and symlink creation.

methods.name: log
methods.description: Logs messages with a specific prefix for build steps.

methods.name: die
methods.description: Outputs an error message and exits the script.
